name: Bruxa: Tactical Espionage Cooking
description:
Bruxa: Tactical Espionage Cooking is a cooking-stealth game. 

You play as a witch in a town looking for something to burn into a stake. To escape you must summon a portal, by preparing different recipes. The only problem... The ingredients are scattered around town!

Controls: 

  • Arrows: Move
  • Ctrl: Drop object
  • Esc: Pause menu

----------------------------------------------------------------

Developed for Ludum Dare 41 (theme "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres") by:

  • Edu Gargollo : Programming
  • Gabriel Álvarez: Art
